content.question: Which of the graphs correctly represents the potential difference across the resistor with resistance <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math> as a function of time after the switch is closed?

choices.label: The figure shows the graph of a curve in the first quadrant of a coordinate plane. The horizontal axis is labeled “Time,” and no values are indicated along it. The vertical axis is labeled “Potential Difference,” and the values 0, E over 2, and E are indicated. The curve begins on the vertical axis at E, moves downward and to the right, rapidly at first and then more gradually, and ends nearly level on the horizontal axis at its right end.
